exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall p q : nat, p * q = 1 -> p = 1 /\\ q = 1" on hypothesis of type "p div 1".

original: intros H. apply mult_is_one in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply Nat.eq_mul_1 in H2. destruct H2 as [H3 H4]. apply Nat.eq_mul_1_nonneg in H1. destruct H1 as [H5 H6]. rewrite H5, H6. symmetry. apply Nat.eq_mul_1_nonneg'; auto.
